speaker: Clown
introDialogue:
Bumbling buffoon, brace for a brilliant battle!
You’ll be beaten by this brawling busker!
title: Clowning Around
description:
Something is off about this encounter. The clown seems eager to goad you into a battle, but to what end?

The {{blacephalonName}} is especially strange, like it has @[TOOLTIP_TITLE]{weird types and ability.}

1.label: Battle the Clown
1.tooltip:
(-) Strange Battle
(?) Affects One Pokémon’s Ability
1.selected: Your pitiful Pokémon are poised for a pathetic performance!
1.applyAbilityDialogue:
A sensational showcase!
Your savvy suits a special skill as spoils!
1.applyAbilityMessage: The clown is offering to permanently Skill Swap one of your Pokémon’s ability to {{ability}}!
1.abilityPrompt: Would you like to permanently teach a Pokémon the {{ability}} ability?

2.label: Remain Unprovoked
2.selected:
Dismal dodger, you deny a delightful duel?
Feel my fury!
2.selected2:
The clown’s {{blacephalonName}} uses Trick!
All of your {{switchPokemon}}’s items were randomly swapped!
2.selected3: Flustered fool, fall for my flawless deception!

3.label: Return the Insults
3.selected:
Dismal dodger, you deny a delightful duel?
Feel my fury!
3.selected2:
The clown’s {{blacephalonName}} uses a strange move!
All of your team’s types were randomly swapped!
3.selected3: Flustered fool, fall for my flawless deception!

outro:
The clown and his cohorts
disappear in a puff of smoke.
